Class DBAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • jimjams.airmonitor.database.DBAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AMDBContract

    public class DBAccess
extends Object
implements AMDBContract
    Allows access to the database

      • DBAccess

        private DBAccess()

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • flatten

        private static String flatten(List list)
        Converts a List into a String of semicolon-separated values.
        Parameters:
        list - The List
        Returns:
        List, as a single String

      • getProfileId

        public long getProfileId()
                  throws SQLiteFullException
        Gets the ID from the current Profile. If no Profile exists, 0 is returned. If more than one Profile exists, an SQLiteFullException is thrown, as the database should not contain more than one Profile.
        Returns:
        The ID of the current Profile, or 0 if no Profile exists
        Throws:
        SQLiteFullException - if the database contains more than one Profile

      • getProfileConditions

        public List<String> getProfileConditions()
                                  throws SQLiteFullException
        Attempts to populate a List of existing conditions from the Profile table. If no Profile exists, an empty List is returned. If more than one Profile exists, an SQLiteFullException is thrown, as there should not be more than one Profile in the database.
        Returns:
        A List of existing conditions
        Throws:
        SQLiteFullException

      • toString

        public String toString(String dbName)
        Returns a String representation of the specified table in the database.
        Parameters:
        dbName - The table to be represented
        Returns:
        String representation of the table

      • getSnapshots

        public List<Snapshot> getSnapshots(long userId)
        Returns a List of all Snapshots associated with a user in the database.
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user
        Returns:
        All Snapshots in the database

      • getSnapshot

        public Snapshot getSnapshot(long id)
        Retrieves a Snapshot from the database. null is returned if there is no Snapshot with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Snapshot to be retrieved
        Returns:
        The specified Snapshot, or null

      • getEMA

        private EcologicalMomentaryAssessment getEMA(long id)
        Retrieves an EcologicalMomentaryAssessment from the database. null is returned if there is no EcologicalMomentaryAssessment with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the EcologicalMomentaryAssessment to be retrieved
        Returns:
        The specified EcologicalMomentaryAssessment, or null

      • getSensorData

        private List<SensorData> getSensorData(List<Long> ids)
        Returns a List of SensorData based on the IDs passed.
        Parameters:
        ids - The IDs of the desired SensorData records in the database
        Returns:
        List of SensorData

      • getSensorData

        private SensorData getSensorData(long id)
        Returns a SensorData built from the record with the specified ID. If the id does not exist, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the desired record
        Returns:
        SensorData built from the specified record

      • inflateString

        private List<String> inflateString(String str)
        Expands a semicolon-separated String into a List of Strings
        Parameters:
        str - The semicolon-separated input String
        Returns:
        The input, as a List
